## PoiTableManager.addTable() method

Manually add a \[\[PoiTable\]\]. Normally, the \[\[PoiTables\]\]s are specified in the \[\[Theme\]\]. Ensure that the name is unique.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
addTable(poiTable: PoiTable): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  poiTable | [PoiTable](./harp-mapview.poitable.md) |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
